user_query: to pat children especially on their foreheads it's normal in American culture but offensive in Hmong culture these two actions by Walt can be seen as unacceptable to the Hmong who get offended every time Walt does this what are we doing what do you want to do share your tools in the lice bag you can use one of these and you'll need one of these here I can't afford any of this I'll cover it you can pay me back on your first paycheck cool here you'll need something like that and this is what I'm looking for here too there you go not to but wouldn't I be needing some tools tools I've got but I'm not going to lend you my tool belt you can pick up tools as you go I really appreciate all this forget it no I really do thank you towards the end of the film Walt is no longer a racist angry anti-social human being he's someone who helps and cares about Thao and his family's well-being and also the rest of his Hmong neighbors Walt having become Thao's friend and mentor changes Thao's life for the better he's no longer timid

entities.entity_description: Walt는 영화에서 처음에는 인종차별적이고 화가 많으며 반사회적인 인물이었으나, 영화 후반부에는 Thao와 그의 가족, 그리고 Hmong 이웃들을 돕고 걱정하는 인물로 변화한다. Thao의 친구이자 멘토가 된다
Thao는 Walt의 도움을 받는 Hmong 청년으로, 처음에는 소심했으나 Walt의 멘토링을 통해 더 나은 삶을 살게 된다
Gran Torino는 미국 문화와 Hmong 문화의 충돌, 그리고 인종차별적인 노인이 Hmong 이웃들과 교류하며 변화하는 이야기를 다룬 영화이다

relationships.relationship_description: Walt는 Thao의 친구이자 멘토가 되어 그의 삶을 더 나은 방향으로 변화시킨다
Walt는 Gran Torino의 주인공으로 영화 전반에 걸쳐 성격 변화를 보여주는 핵심 인물이다
Thao는 Gran Torino에서 Walt와 함께 중요한 역할을 하는 등장인물이다
